data.prayer: Father, help the 634 believers in Spanish Wells to be spiritually intentional with their relationships among their 967 lost friends and neighbors.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Spanish Wells, Bahamas
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Lord, give grace to the local leaders who shepherd the 634 believers in the state of Spanish Wells.
data.verse: I am the good shepherd. The good shepherd lays down his life for the sheep.

data.prayer: Spirit, teach the children in the state of Spanish Wells to pray with passion and pleading for your presence.
Lord, help the people of Spanish Wells, Bahamas to discover the essence of being a disciple, making disciples, and how to plant churches that multiply.
Jesus, your return is closer than when we first believed. Please, set urgency in the hearts of the people living in the state of Spanish Wells.
data.verse: Besides this you know the time, that the hour has come for you to wake from sleep. For salvation is nearer to us now than when we first believed.

data.prayer: Father, move the 634 believers in the state of Spanish Wells to say "Not our will, but yours be done", like Jesus.
data.verse: He withdrew about a stone’s throw beyond them, knelt down and prayed, "Father, if you are willing, take this cup from me; yet not my will, but yours be done."

data.prayer: Lord, please give the 634 believers in the state of Spanish Wells the Spirit of wisdom and revelation, so that they might know you better.
data.verse: I keep asking that the God of our Lord Jesus Christ, the glorious Father, may give you the Spirit of wisdom and revelation, so that you may know him better.

data.section_summary:
the state of Spanish Wells, Bahamas has a population of 1,600.

We estimate Spanish Wells has 634 people who might know Jesus, 878 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 89 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 2 neighbors who need Jesus.
